list.name: api
list.query:
from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r.api and r.api != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => "$script" == "All" or contains(value: r.script, set: ${script:json}))
  |> keep(columns: ["api"])
  |> distinct(column: "api")
  |> sort(columns: ["api"])

targets.query:
from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_duration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => "$script" == "All" or contains(value: r.script, set: ${script:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => "$api" == "All" or contains(value: r.api, set: ${api:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> quantile(q: 0.95, method: "estimate_tdigest")

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_reqs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => "$script" == "All" or contains(value: r.script, set: ${script:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => "$api" == "All" or contains(value: r.api, set: ${api:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) / 10.0 }))

total = from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_reqs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => "$script" == "All" or contains(value: r.script, set: ${script:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => "$api" == "All" or contains(value: r.api, set: ${api:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

failed = from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_req_failed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => "$script" == "All" or contains(value: r.script, set: ${script:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => "$api" == "All" or contains(value: r.api, set: ${api:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

join(tables: {total: total, failed: failed}, on: ["_time","script","api"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _value: r._value_failed, script: r.script, api: r.api }))

from(bucket: "k6")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "vus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => "$script" == "All" or contains(value: r.script, set: ${script:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
